articles.title: Over 500 works of Kim Jong Il released
Floral baskets laid for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Over 500 works of Kim Jong Il released
   Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House recently released 10 odd works of General Secretary Kim Jong Il including a collection of his works "On Developing Scientific and Educational Work."     As a result, over 500 works of his in all have been released by the publishing house since it brought out his concluding speech at a national training course for party propagandists on February 19, Juche 63 (1974), which dealt with the immediate tasks in the party ideological work for modeling the whole society on the Juche idea.     These are some of the works authored by Kim Jong Il while guiding the work for realizing the modeling of the whole society on the Juche idea.     The works came off the press in forms of collection and pamphlet.

articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's work published in Syria
   Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The famous work of General Secretary Kim Jong Il "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was published in booklet last Monday by the Dar Dimashk Publishing House of Syria.   Written on the first page of the booklet are letters "This work is published on the occasion of the 57th birthday of the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il."
